title: Adapt to change or leave the land
creator_credit: Tom Carroll, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: As Tom Carroll reflects on five generations of his family and their land at Mudgeegonga in northern Victoria. In doing so, he recalls the various challenges his ancestors faced, as well as the changes they needed to accomodate, much in the same way he has to today.
